title: Gala Night 2025 Recap
excerpt: Our annual gala was a tremendous success, raising over $500,000 for arts education programs.
content:
Thank you to everyone who joined us for Gala Night 2025! The evening was filled with inspiring performances, heartfelt stories, and incredible generosity.

With over 400 attendees, we raised more than $500,000 to support arts education in underserved communities. These funds will directly impact thousands of students across the region.

**Highlights:**
- Opening performance by the Youth Orchestra
- Keynote speech by renowned artist Maria Chen
- Silent auction featuring original artwork
- Recognition of our Community Champions

We're deeply grateful to our sponsors, donors, volunteers, and everyone who made this evening possible. Together, we're creating a world where the arts are accessible to all.
author: Newsletter Manager Bot
